about_me.des: Now,I am a Python engineer with platform development, project maintenance and deployment in QTZ. As well as operational experience, familiar with shell, the python script to write.My goal is to become a Devop ability of the enginner.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in QTZ and using the Django framework development the data game's platform of the company .
career.netease_des: Network professional graduated from hunan university of technology, officially out of school, into the society.
career.ucloud_des: In Beijing sohu changyou practice system operations engineer, learn the PXE server management and building, involved in the operational platform and the development of operational tools, started the python development path.
career.college_des: Training in Hunan Double Start to be a LInux operations engineer,introduction to Linux ops.
